title: Chelsea fan Callum Turner fumes as Premier League rivals Arsenal thrash Aston Villa - while fiancée and Gunners fan Dua Lipa shrieks with delight
body_text:
Chelsea fan Callum Turner fumes as Premier League rivals Arsenal thrash Aston Villa - while fiancée and Gunners fan Dua Lipa shrieks with delight
- Have YOU got a story? Email: tips@dailymail.co.uk
It was a tale of two halves for Callum Turner and Dua Lipa on Tuesday night as they watched Arsenal beat Aston Villa 4-1.
Actor Callum, 35, who is an avid Chelsea fan, looked on in dismay as he watched his Premiere League rival scoop victory at Emirates stadium.
And the actor's fiancée Dua Lipa, 30, did little to commiserate him as she jumped for joy alongside her model sister Rina, 24, and father Dukagjin, 56.
Arsenal's emphatic 4-1 victory put them five points clear at the top of the table and six points clear of a third-placed Villa team.
After Villa had the better of the first half, a bad mistake from Emiliano Martinez at an Arsenal corner allowed Gabriel to open the scoring early in the second half, and Villa never recovered. Martin Zubimendi scored a second four minutes later and Arsenal were home free.
Leandro Trossard got a fine third and substitute Gabriel Jesus grabbed a fourth to put the pressure back on Manchester City, who travel to Sunderland on New Year's Day knowing that they have to win to keep the pressure on the Gunners.

The London-born pop artist has previously spoken about her affiliation to Premier League clubs Arsenal and Liverpool.
In a video she filmed shortly after her performance at the 2018 Champions League final, which was won 3-1 by Real Madrid against Jurgen Klopp's Reds, Dua said: 'I'm an honorary Liverpool supporter.
'My dad and brother support Arsenal so I'd be getting in a lot of trouble if I said I just support Liverpool. But I love Liverpool - its always got a special place in my heart.'
The family outing comes after Dua reflected on her amazing year on Instagram over the weekend.
The singer shared a round up of snaps from 2025 on Sunday as she looked back on the past 12 months, including one picture of her sparkling £25,000 engagement ring from her fiancé Callum.
Dua declared that life 'just keeps getting better' as she posed with actor Callum and looked as loved-up as ever.
The gorgeous diamond on a stylish thick gold band dominated the image as she cosied up to her partner.
Other snaps in the album showed her posing behind the scenes of he radial optimism tour, with her dancers and celebrating her birthday.

Dua and Callum first started dating in January 2024, and the couple confirmed they were engaged in June this year.
Callum recently candidly opened up on his romance with fiancée Dua, saying that she was 'the most beautiful woman in the world'.
In an interview with The Times Style, he detailed their first meeting.
He also revealed the 'rule' the pair have that allows them to maintain their relationship amid their busy schedules and long-distance.
Callum explained they had 'maybe two, three, four, five near misses over our time where we didn't meet', before finally finding each other.
He said: 'There were loads of things like that and then, when we were both able to, we were both single and whatever, I just thought she was the most beautiful woman in the world.'
The actor recalled how they sparked up an instantaneous connection during drinks for a mutual friend's birthday, when they were sat next to each other and realised they both were one chapter into reading the same novel, Hernan Diaz's Trust.
